snippet: Credit Suisse, JPMorgan Chase and other investment banks are said to be considering limiting the ability of their traders to chat electronically with other banks amid a series of investigations of potential manipulation of the foreign exchange...
abstract: Credit Suisse, JPMorgan Chase and other investment banks are said to be considering limiting the ability of their traders to chat electronically with other banks amid a series of investigations of potential manipulation of the foreign exchange market.

headline.main: Banks May Curb Traders' Use of Chat Rooms
